title: Organization Schema
description: A JSON Schema for the Organization credential that represents organizational information using schema.org vocabulary.

id.description: The unique identifier for the organization, typically a DID or URI.

schema:legalName.description: The legal name of the organization.

schema:telephone.description: The telephone number of the organization.

schema:email.description: The email address of the organization.

schema:vatID.description: The VAT identification number of the organization.

schema:taxID.description: The tax identification number of the organization.

type.description: The type of the address object.

schema:streetAddress.description: The street address of the organization.

schema:addressLocality.description: The locality (city) of the organization's address.

schema:addressRegion.description: The region (state/province) of the organization's address.

schema:postalCode.description: The postal code of the organization's address.

schema:addressCountry.description: The country of the organization's address (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code).

schema:url.description: The website URL of the organization.

schema:foundingDate.description: The founding date of the organization.

schema:industry.description: The industry sector of the organization.

schema:leiCode.description: The Legal Entity Identifier (LEI) code of the organization.

schema:duns.description: The D-U-N-S number of the organization.
